alert.note: Alert for Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 17 at 3:25AM EST until November 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM FRIDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 24 inches south of Route 68, and 6 to 10 inches north. * WHERE...Southwestern St. Lawrence County. * WHEN...From 4 AM Friday to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to fall between 7 AM Friday and 7 AM Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
